features: Package includes 18 file folders in 6 beautiful colors. This is a great way to organize your files and keep them looking stylish. These are perfect for any home, office, or school project!
Mr. Pen file folders are made of thick, high-quality paper. The folders are flexible, durable, and easy to clean - perfect for everyday use.
Our file folders are a great way to store letter-size paper documents and business cards. The folders measure 9.5" by 11.5", which is the standard size for letters.
Keep organized and effortlessly identify your documents with a 1/3-cut tab system in three distinct positions. Simply add custom labels to locate anything you need quickly!

Mr. Pen file folder is an excellent solution for staying on top of your notes. Not only do they provide a great way to keep documents organized, but you can also color code them to make finding what you need in the future much easier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These file folders are excellent. They arrived quickly, are very sturdy and the colors are a nice plus as well. Would order from this seller again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great colors and sturdy too
reviews.reviewText: I cannot tell a lie. I love to organize and I like to keep paper copies of some of my records and receipts. So, when I spotted these colorful file folders I knew they could be very useful.In this set there are 18 folders in 6 vibrant colors. They measure 11.5” x 9.5” so they easily store letter-size documents. The folders are very sturdy. They’re made from thick paper with bit of a smooth coating that makes it easy to wipe clean. I especially love the various jewel-tone/retro colors. They add a great pop of color to my desk and file drawers.Mr Pen has become one of my favorite companies for office supplies. Their prices are very reasonable without sacrificing quality. I knew, before I even received them, that this set of file folders would be no exception. I’m very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend these folders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No complaints with these folders!
reviews.reviewText: These folders came true to advertised and will be a great help in organizing all of my loose papers. The colors look really nice and they aren't super bright like many other folders can be.The one thing I can think of that would be a pro for some people and a con for others is that the inside of the folder is white. That means you have to be aware of which direction the tab faces to be able to see the color of the folder. This isn't an issue for me since I am mostly using them in vertical orientation where the tab won't be the focus on the organization system (but rather the color of the folder will be for me). I know this could be a bit of an annoyance when figuring out how to best label the folders, but otherwise doesn't bother me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick strudy and colorful addition to the file cabinet
reviews.reviewText: Value matches the price for this set of folders. They are thicker and sturdier then I expected. I like having color folders to better organize by category. These are the kind of folders you want to carry documents in them to other locations or use in a portable file cabinet.These would be ideal for teachers as well. Adds some cheer to your sorting and organizing process. I am happy with the quality and would recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality and Great Colors
reviews.reviewText: These are good quality folders made from a heavier stock than many of the manilla folders out there. I got them so I can color code my filing cabinet according to the different subjects. The pricing is not terrible, you get 18 folders for $6.99 which comes out to about $.39 each. My only complaints are (1) that the inside of the folder is white. I suppose they did this so that the tab you write on wouldn't be colored and hence make the writing hard to see. The result however is that you lose a little of the benefit of the color coding once they are tucked into the file cabinet. In a perfect world, the inside of the folder would be the same color and the company would supply write on labels for the tab. (2) That although the folders are 1/3 cut, they are oriented by color, not within color, so if you want to organize subject by color, all the tabs will have the same orientation. These drawbacks are why I only gave the folders 3 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These folders are a much higher quality and more durable than your regular manilla folder. I love the different colors. Many of my folders were getting old and beat up and needed replaced. I like being able to color code my folders and this set has just the right amount of folders to be able to do that. I recommend these folders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High-quality and useful
reviews.reviewText: This is a good set of solid, well-made folders. The material is much heavier than run-of-the-mill Manila folders, and this promises to make this item much more durable than the standard kind. If you're looking for something that will hold up when constantly removed from and replaced in a file drawer, this seems to be a great choice.The colors are bright and unmistakable. They'll be very useful for transferring information in a memorable way: "The deed is in the teal folder I gave you last week."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and vibrant in color
reviews.reviewText: These are high quality folder. They are sturdy and can hold a lot of items easily. They aren't flimsy, which is a huge plus. The colors are vibrant, so it'd quite nice to have the ability to organize everything in a nice, color coded manner. I will definitely be purchasing more of these when I run out!
